titleStmt.title: An Encoded Transcription of Material from the Sylvia Beach Papers

msIdentifier.repository: Princeton University. Library. Dept. of Rare Books and Special Collections

change.ab: Transcribed cards. s1: <*> = marking on first two books, "estre"? <*> = "then"? "them"? "mandat" and "maudar" could be same word, recordkeeping shorthand s2: <*> = lots of illegible crossed-out numbers <*> = illegible payment notation <*> = "shape"? "sheep"? <*> = "postaur"? <*> = "ballads"? s3: <*> = "Jafau"?

body.ab:
1937 CASSAIGNE Madame. E Villa Willwoll Willwohl Rue des Vosqes BITCHE Moselles (Moselle) 1 m. 1 v. 16.50 Deposit 30.00 Jan 5 Letters of Lawrence Jan 7 7 Journal K. Mansfield Jan 18 Jan 18 In a german Pension p 1.60 Jan 25 25 Life of Katherine Mansfield Feb 9 p. 2.00 pd Received 2.00v Jan 27 Renewed Feb 5. March 5 1947 mandat 16,50 bought Poems of K. Mansfield 62.00. postage 2.00. owes total 64.00 paid 8 SB wrote Feb 9 maudar 66.00 Feb 9 Modern Fiction Feb. 18 Between two Worlds p. 4.20 paid 18 Feb 18 17 Novels & Novelists p. 1.80 Feb 26 26 Black Monk March 18 paid 20 March 1 Horse Steelers March 18 Darling March 18 paid 3.50p Love March 18 p. 3.40 March 3. Renewed. March 5. - April 5. mandat. 16.50 March 18 In a german Pension April 1st
renewed April 5 _ May 5. 16,50 April 7 Katherine Mansfield's Letters April 17 17 Religio Medici May 7 Orape. Essays p. <*> April 27 renewed May 5 - August 5 44.50 May 7 Christopher Marlowe p. 1.80 May 21 21 Shakespeare's works p. 3.00 June 9 June 9 Ulysses <*> paid 3 frs 2.80 " 25 15 Clarissa Harlowe 7.60 July 10 (and after <*> Gods paid for Eliot book & postage June 30 received by versament compte cheques <*> (25,35 July 10 Tom Jones. vol. 1+11 p. 2.20 July 31 Renewed Aug 23 1937 by mandat for 77 frs 6 mos 1 vol Sept 3. Confessions of an Opium Eater Oct 2 Vicar of Wakefield Oct 2 Pride and Prejudice p. Oct 2 (start Sept 6 1937 on account of delay SB away) (received m.o. Oct 1st 4.40) Oct 2 Lyrical Ballads Wordsworth (renewed) Nov. 18 p. 5.60 Blake (Oxford) Nov. 4 William Blake the Man. gardener Nov. 4 Nov 4. <*>. (Postage paid till Nov. 4) Nov 24 29 Jane Austen's Esther Waters Life & Letters p. 3f20 Dec 22 paid Dec 22 Dec 22 Wuthering Heights + Agnes Gray Jan 12 Jan 12 p.4.40 Fool of the Family Jan 28 Two Carlyles postage 4.40 Jan 28 subsc expires on April 6th 1938 March Feb 21 4.40 Salome & Importance of Being Earnest March 14 8.80 Lady Windermere March 14 Tess March 14
1938 Mme Cassaigne 21 rue Descarles Ecole Polytechnique Renewed March 6. Sept 6 1938 1 v 115 post. to March 14 8.80 123.80 March 14 Together + Apart. March 23 Mar. 23- Diary of Samuel Pepys Apr 22 Apr 22 <*> May 11 May 11 Swinburne Vol 1 May 24 May 24 Legend June 3 June 3 Jacob Stahl June 20 June 20 Chesterfield's Letters v-2 July 11 in one vol. July 11 Works of Sterne Vol. I July 29 July 29 Works of Sterne Vol. II Sept 1 Letter Oct 17 Said Would Renew Later Has Had Child
1958 CASSAIGNE, Mrs. Ella (leaving for Pornichet July 3.58) June 25 Robert Frost's Poems (Mod. Lib) In Dubious Battle, Steinbeck American Drama (Guys & Dolls etc) The Unknown God (Joyce Cary) Yeats Dramatic Works (vol 2 of Works) Weekend Callendar (Chatto & Windus) Homer's Daughter, Robert Graves
